Pack.Title: PHP by example
Pack.Description: Most of the existing plugins are developed from a common include file which sends the request to the Shipping Guide API (Fraktguiden). Feel free to be inspired from existing plugins and improve the code if needed.

Install.Step: Do what you need, improve the code if needed
Add the result to Google Code or GitHub and send us a link, then we will put it here with your name on it... :)
